QuestData.Title: The Temple of Rezan
QuestData.Description:
De chronicler's words are dire. If Zul truly does wish to sacrifice Rezan...
Dis will not come to pass! I will defend my loa with my life.
Come, $n, we go to de Temple of Rezan. We must stop dis heresy at once!
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet King Rastakhan at the Temple of Rezan.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet King Rastakhan at the Temple of Rezan.
